name: Nikolai Intergalactic Post Man
description:
You are Nikolai, the best intergalactic postman this universe could hope for, although not a lucky one. An unidentified object struck your ship during an important delivery, knocking off parts of your ship and some of the mail, which drifted off to a planet never discovered before. You need to bring back all of the ship parts and as much mail as you can. Not only your life is at stake, but your duty as well - your boss does not tolerate the delays...

NIPM is a game jam project, created for a polish #zostańwdomurób gry game jam promoting game creation during the tough times of quarantine.
Category of the jam was "rebuild/repair/restoration" (odbudowa). Your task is to rebuild a ship and return to work. Time is of the essence, as postman's job is quite important. Especially on an intergallactic scale!

This is MOX's first ever game jam entry. Made by a fantastic trio of:

  • Programming and Music - Piotr 'Sir Regalia' Klich
  • Graphics and Character Design - Egill 'Swordsman' Lind
  • Level Design - Jakub 'Mistre' Skonecki
